name: Merge Plants
description:
Join the Merge Plants! Merge your plants and heal zombies to save the world!
Play this fast & fun idle-puzzle game anywhere, anytime, no internet needed after the initial install. Simply download the game and start merging!

== Create your Garden==

. Merge a variety of plants as you create a beautiful garden.
. From sunflowers, to mushroom, to cactus, discover more unique plants!

== Heal the zombies ==

.Collecting sun produced by your plants.
.Heal funny zombies who is about to invade your home.
.Don’t stop merging plants to produces more sunlight, because ZOMBIE BOSS is coming!

== Save the world!==
.From your home, to school, to factory, to police station, save your city with your lovely garden.
.New York, Paris, London… kill the viruses all over the world!

Download today and join the Merge Plants, enjoy this simple but addictive game!
